name: places/ChIJm7OdX5VZwokRe7KcX8i6nIA
formattedAddress: 632 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 632 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014-5100, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of hosting my wedding at 632 on Hudson which is the most chic and captivating venue in New York City, and I cannot say enough about how absolutely perfect the experience was. From the moment we stepped into the venue, we knew we had found something truly special.

The first thing that struck us was the venue's design, making it an ideal backdrop for our special day. The chic decor, including stunning chandeliers and eclectic artwork, created a romantic and sophisticated ambiance that left our guests in awe.

What truly sets this venue apart is its attention to detail and impeccable service. The entire team went above and beyond to make sure our day was flawless. I would also recommend the owner’s floral and decor services, she did a lovely job and made my planning so easy.

On the day of our wedding, everything was executed with precision and grace. The staff's commitment to ensuring our guests had a memorable experience was truly remarkable. I would encourage anyone interested in hosting an event at 632 on Hudson to use the venue’s preferred caterer, BITE. From the perfectly timed cocktail hour to the exquisite dinner service, we received countless compliments from our friends and family about the quality of the food and the overall service.

The venue's picturesque rooftop also added an extra layer of charm to our celebration. It allowed for stunning photo opportunities and a serene setting that our guests enjoyed.

In summary, our wedding at this NYC venue was an absolute dream come true. We couldn't have asked for a more chic and interesting setting to celebrate our special day. The compliments from our guests were a testament to the venue's excellence, and we couldn't be happier with our choice. If you're looking for a wedding venue that combines style, sophistication, and a touch of magic, this is the place to make your dreams come true. Thank you to the entire team for making our wedding day perfect in every way!

originalText.text:
My husband and I had our wedding on 8/21/2022 at the one and only 632 On Hudson. It was the most unforgettable day of our life!

We found the venue last June. It was fantastic, and we fell in love with the place at first sight. We started to build our wedding based on the venue's vibe since then. Karen, the owner, has been very welcoming and super helpful along the way. Working with Karen was very pleasing and smooth. She is the most warm-hearted vendor I've ever met. She eased my stress and offered me a lot of excellent advice.

The catering service that she recommended was exceptional as well. Franck, the Director of Operations & Catering, was a pleasure to work with and was very accommodating. The food was absolutely amazing! Everyone loved the meal and is still raving about it.

632 On Hudson is the place for weddings or events you will never regret!

originalText.text: My wife and I had are wedding at 632 on 6/5/22. It was the absolute best night of our lives. We had the perfect wedding, and all of our guests were so pleased. If you want to have an incredible event, with great places for friends to dance, talk, eat, laugh, AND take FANTASTIC PHOTOS, 632 is absolutely unparalleled. Karen, the owner, and her staff are a delight to work with.

originalText.text: Had my wedding here fall of 2023. This venue is TRULY one-of-a-kind. Pictures do not capture the magic. Karen & the entire 632 team are a pleasure to work with. I had a very positive experience, ran into no issues & can honestly say that our day ran very smoothly because of this team!

text.text: Had my wedding here fall of 2023. This venue is TRULY one-of-a-kind. Pictures do not capture the magic. Karen & the entire 632 team are a pleasure to work with. I had a very positive experience, ran into no issues & can honestly say that our day ran very smoothly because of this team!

originalText.text: This is a gem of a venue. Meticulously decorated with incredibly tasteful art and antiques from the owner’s personal collection. Karen (the owner) and her team were SUPER attentive and genuinely cared about making sure our event was magical, memorable, and ran smoothly. They went above and beyond with recommendations and solutions. Even when those unavoidable last-minute hiccups with other vendors occurred the day-of the event, Karen and her team were right there   to help. Such a relief. We felt in great hands with Karen and her team. They’ve hosted a lot of events in the venue over the years and know how it’s done, so they’re very communicative with clients and vendors about what is needed and how to do it. We’re extremely grateful to her and her team. ALL our guests were thrilled to party at this glorious venue. Thank you, 632onHudson. It was perfect and uniquely special and we can’t wait to visit again for future events.
